subject: AccuWeather.com Alert(tm) Advisory  (avcavc)
body:
AccuWeather.com Alert[TM]






















 







							Severe Watches and Warnings for BEVERLY HILLS 













LOXCFWLOX
WHUS46 KLOX 151702
CFWLOX

COASTAL HAZARD MESSAGE
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE LOS ANGELES/OXNARD CA
1002 AM PDT SUN APR 15 2007

CAZ040-041-152230-
/O.NEW.KLOX.CF.S.0005.070415T1702Z-070416T1700Z/
VENTURA COUNTY COAST-
LOS ANGELES COUNTY COAST INCLUDING DOWNTOWN LOS ANGELES-
1002 AM PDT SUN APR 15 2007

..HIGHER THAN NORMAL SURF OVER LOS ANGELES AND VENTURA COUNTY
BEACHES...

STRONG AND WIDESPREAD WEST TO NORTHWEST FLOW WILL IMPACT THE
COASTAL WATERS OF SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA...WHICH WILL GENERATE A
MODERATE TO LARGE SHORT PERIOD WIND SWELL. THIS WIND SWELL WILL
BUILD THROUGH THIS EVENING...THEN SUBSIDE THROUGH MONDAY MORNING.
AS A RESULT...SHORT PERIOD CHOPPY SURF WILL BUILD TO 3 TO 6 FT
ALONG THE BEACHES OF LOS ANGELES AND VENTURA COUNTY THIS AFTERNOON
AND EVENING. LOCAL SETS TO 7 FT ARE POSSIBLE OVER THE WINDIEST AND
MOST EXPOSED WEST FACING SHORES.

STRONG RIP CURRENTS WILL ALSO IMPACT THE AREA WITH THIS SURF
THROUGH MONDAY. STRONG RIP CURRENTS WILL MAKE SWIMMING OR SURFING
IN THESE HIGHER THAN NORMAL WAVES VERY DANGEROUS FOR ANYONE. IF IN
DOUBT...JUST STAY OUT.

$$

KITTELL
